medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported a 2-week history of generalized pruritus which began 1 week after the resolution of a mild upper respiratory tract infection. The pruritus progressively interfered with sleep and was accompanied by decreased appetite, fatigue, and dizziness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of chronic rhinitis, nasal polyposis, and two spontaneous miscarriages during the first trimester. Surgical history includes tubal ligation.
medical_history.family_history: Father had unspecified kidney problems at age 60.
medical_history.social_history: Emigrated from the Dominican Republic at 40. Works at a clothing store, lives alone, sexually active with a male partner, drinks alcohol occasionally, and has never smoked or used illicit drugs.
